articles.author: Jordan Raanan
articles.title: New York Giants fire coach Joe Judge after just two seasons - ESPN Australia
articles.description: The Giants fired coach Joe Judge on Tuesday after his two losing seasons with the team, the move coming a day after GM Dave Gettleman retired.
articles.content:
EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. -- The New York Giants fired coach Joe Judge on Tuesday after his two losing seasons with the team.
The move comes a day after general manager Dave Gettleman retired after four… [+4260 chars]
